name: textgrad
prompt:
Here is the role of the variable you will improve: <ROLE>System prompt for paper acceptance prediction. This prompt sets the context and approach for the AI reviewer.</ROLE>.

The variable is the text within the following span: <VARIABLE> You are an expert academic reviewer tasked with evaluating research papers. </VARIABLE>

Here is the context and feedback we got for the variable:

<CONTEXT></CONTEXT>

Improve the variable (System prompt for paper acceptance prediction. This prompt sets the context and approach for the AI reviewer.) using the feedback provided in <FEEDBACK> tags.
Send the improved variable in the following format:

<IMPROVED_VARIABLE>{the improved variable}</IMPROVED_VARIABLE>

Send ONLY the improved variable between the <IMPROVED_VARIABLE> tags, and nothing else.
